name: Echo (itch) (Tranquil Abyss)
description:
A bat using echolocation to find and eat bugs. W to move forwards, A and D to to turn, and Spacebar to send out an echo. See how many points you can achieve.

Credits:

Mark Black - Programmer

Michael Simpson - Programmer

Karley Karensky - Artist

Julia Zuckerberg - Artist

Alex Cole - Sound Design

Emanuel Whittington - Composer
